overview: What is essential in a time of upheaval? Director Brittany Farhat documented the months of panic and epiphany in the leadup to July Talkâ€™s lauded Drive-In Shows of 2020, and with the help of unreleased archival footage spanning a decade, follows the thoughtful group of artists to a crossroads of identity and circumstance.
tagline: What is essential in a time of upheaval?
title: July Talk: Love Lives Here
